english_translation: Yahya ibn Abi Kathir (8667-8667): A narrator whose full name and biographical details require separate documentation.

potential_issues.impact: This is a biographical entry about a narrator, not a traditional hadith with matn. Analyzed based on historical record of narrator information.

Topics: Biographical information about Yahya ibn Abi Kathir

english_translation: It is reported that a freed slave of Tayy who was from the people of Basra and then settled in al-Yamama said: Yahya ibn Kathir ibn Yahya ibn Abi Kathir al-Yamami informed us, saying: I saw my uncle Nasr ibn Yahya ibn Abi Kathir, by whom Yahya ibn Abi Kathir al-Yamami was known by his kunya. And others said: Yahya ibn Abi Kathir was known by the kunya Abu Ayyub.

narrators.name: Yahya ibn Kathir ibn Yahya
narrators.full_name: Yahya ibn Kathir ibn Yahya ibn Abi Kathir al-Yamami

narrators.name: Nasr ibn Yahya
narrators.full_name: Nasr ibn Yahya ibn Abi Kathir

chainIssues: Second narrator has weak reliability (layyin al-hadith)

IISGrade: Disconnections But All Narrators Are Ok
Topics: Biographical information about the lineage of Yahya ibn Abi Kathir
Documentation of alternative names and kunyat of early narrators

english_translation: Musa ibn Ismail informed us, saying: I heard Wuhayb ibn Khalid saying: I heard Ayyub al-Sakhtiyani saying: 'There remains on earth nothing like Yahya ibn Abi Kathir.' And Muhammad ibn Sa'd said: Ismail ibn Ulayyah said: 'I witnessed Ayyub writing to Yahya ibn Abi Kathir.' And Sufyan ibn Uyaynah said: We used to await his arrival among us. And I heard Abu Nu'aym al-Fadl ibn Dukain saying: 'Yahya ibn Abi Kathir died in the year 129 AH.' A man from Banu Tamim who was a scholar said: The father of Abi Kathir's name was Dinar.

narrators.name: Ayyub al-Sakhtiyani
narrators.full_name: Ayyub ibn Abi Tamimah Kaysan al-Sakhtiyani

chainIssues: This is testimony about Yahya ibn Abi Kathir's excellence, not a traditional hadith
Multiple reports are woven together from different scholars

Topics: Biographical information about Ikrimah ibn Ammar al-'Ajali

english_translation: He narrated from Iyas ibn Salamah al-Akwa, al-Harmas ibn Ziyad al-Bahili, Asim ibn Shumayh al-Ghilani (one of Banu Tamim), and from Ata' ibn Rabah, Damamah ibn Jaws, al-Hadhrami ibn Lahiq, Yahya ibn Abi Kathir, Abu al-Najashi (freed slave of Rafi ibn Khadij), Tariq ibn Abd al-Rahman al-Qurashi, Simak al-Hanafi Abu Zumayyl, and he heard from al-Qasim ibn Muhammad, Salim ibn Abdullah, Nafi (freed slave of Abdullah ibn Umar), Tawus, Abu Kathir al-Ghabri, and Yazid al-Riqashi.

narrators.name: Narrator (unknown)
narrators.full_name: Narrator whose biography lists transmission from multiple authorities

chainIssues: This entry lists transmission authorities but does not identify the actual narrator

Topics: Biographical documentation of narrator's transmission sources
List of authorities from whom a narrator learned

english_translation: And he was known by the kunya Abu Yahya, and he served as a judge in al-Yamama. He narrated from Iyas ibn Salamah ibn al-Akwa, Qays ibn Talq, Abdullah ibn Badr, and he heard from Abu Bakr Muhammad ibn Amr ibn Hazm, Tayslah ibn Ali, Abu Kathir al-Ghabri (who was al-Suhayymi), and from Abu al-Najashi (freed slave of Rafi ibn Khadij), Yahya ibn Abi Kathir, and Yazid ibn Abdullah ibn Qusayy.

narrators.name: Narrator (judge in al-Yamama)
narrators.full_name: Unnamed narrator who served as judge and transmitted from various scholars
